It's a beautiful film with a unique narrative structure that I believe you might find intriguing.

If you're looking for a comedy to lighten things up, "Forgetting Sarah Marshall" could be the perfect choice. It's a heartfelt and hilarious romp that I think you'd enjoy!

I'd highly recommend watching "The Lives of Others." This gripping German film revolves around a Stasi agent who becomes increasingly entwined in the lives of a playwright and his lover. The actor Ulrich Mühe, who plays the main character, delivers an exceptional performance that adds depth to this thought-provoking story set in East Berlin during the 1980s.

If you're keen on exploring more contemporary German cinema with Seth Gilliam, 'Don 2' might be a good choice. It's an action-packed thriller about a criminal mastermind who tries to steal currency printing plates from a bank in Berlin. The film features a diverse ensemble cast and offers plenty of suspense and excitement. Enjoy the ride!
